Homepage.Discover_the_perfect_terpene_profile_for: Discover the perfect terpene profile for your products. The right blend doesn’t just enhance the experience—it creates lasting loyalty and keeps customers coming back.
Homepage.Quality_is_at_our_core_From_seed_to_bott: Quality is at our core. From seed to bottle, we meticulously select the finest ingredients and uphold the highest standards to ensure every terpene delivers unmatched consistency, purity, and excellence.
Homepage.OrderASample_Title: Taste the Difference. Order a Sample.
Homepage.Step_01_Description: Select the pack that best fits your needs
Homepage.Step_03_Description: Experience the best of our terpene profiles!

AboutPage.The_Best_in_the_Terpene_Business_Bar_Non: The Best in the Terpene Business. Bar None.
AboutPage.Header_Description:
Loud Spectrum offers the widest range of terpene profiles1, crafted from premium ingredients and engineered to the highest standards2 for connoisseurs3 seeking heightened experiences4.

We know that’s a bit of a mouthful. So, we broke it down for you:
AboutPage.Point_01_Description: With over 3,500 custom profiles, Loud Spectrum sets the industry standard, offering the widest selection and deepest expertise in terpene formulation.
AboutPage.Point_02_Description: Our terpenes are meticulously formulated using scientific precision and a deep understanding of molecular flavor dynamics, ensuring unmatched quality and consistency.
AboutPage.Point_03_Description: We know you (and your customers) have great taste, and we're dedicated to exceeding expectations.
AboutPage.Point_04_Description: We don’t follow trends—we create them. For over a decade, we’ve been at the forefront of terpene experience, pushing boundaries and redefining what’s possible.

FlavorScience.Title: How do we create terpenes that each have a unique personality and flavor? It’s all in the science. We call it Flavor Science™.

WhyLoudSpectrum.Title:
Why Loud
Spectrum?
WhyLoudSpectrum.Paragraph1: Our terpenes are the bold, vibrant nucleus of every unforgettable experience.
WhyLoudSpectrum.Paragraph2: Each product is that special ingredient to take wind-down time, healing rituals, or a smoke sesh up a notch by enhancing it with taste, flavor, and sensation. It’s those details that make all the difference.
WhyLoudSpectrum.Paragraph3: We’re hands-on, sourcing the finest ingredients and using the most rigorous standards. This perfect chemistry of science and rigor makes our terpenes stand out through unmatched quality and 100% consistency.

OurVision.title: Flavors for Every Occasion
OurVision.subtitle: Our Vision
OurVision.description: Terpenes have the power to help heal, support, elevate... and so much more. That’s why we believe every moment deserves a terpene profile that feels like it was made for it. We created Loud Spectrum to introduce more people to the benefits of premium, organic terpenes, building a portfolio that can be paired with moods, moments, milestones, and everything in between.

WhatAreTerpenes.heading: First, What are Terpenes?
WhatAreTerpenes.description: Terpenes are the natural compounds that give plants their signature scents–like the citrus burst from an orange peel or the calming aroma of lavender.
WhatAreTerpenes.subText: But they do more than just smell delicious. Terpenes can influence flavor and effect of products such as essential oils or cannabis, working in harmony with other plant compounds to shape experiences.

PickYourPace.title: Pick Your Pace
PickYourPace.subtitle: Explore terpenes designed to match your state of mind.

alive.description: Alive is the pinnacle of terpene luxury—pure, rare, and perfected over years of production. Extracted from fresh flower within an hour of picking, this premium line preserves the delicate, full-bodied aroma and complexity of each strain. Never diluted or cut with other products, every batch is a unique vintage, making it a sought-after choice for those who demand the finest. Many customers secure their supply annually to ensure consistency across their products.
facts: Can be CDT (cannabis derived terpene) or HDT (hemp derived terpene)
Extracted in-house through exclusive partnerships with growers
alive.label: Alive

dank.description: Dank is the first-of-its-kind connoisseur terpene line, delivering the rich, skunky essence of cannabis—without the cannabis. Made from 100% natural botanicals, these terpenes pack a potent punch with full-bodied aroma and flavor. From fruity twists like Raspberry Dream to legendary strains like OG Kush and Sour Diesel, Dank brings the gas at an unbeatable value.
dank.label: Dank

sweet.description: Indulge your senses with Sweet—a terpene line made for those who crave bold, fruity flavors with a candy-like kick. From juicy mango to ripe strawberry (and everything in between), these profiles bring a burst of sweetness to any product. Whether you're looking to enhance, mix, or create something entirely new, Sweet delivers the flavor you didn’t know you needed—but won’t want to go without.
facts: Can be customized to add cannabis aroma
sweet.label: Sweet

classic.description: Classic is the original strain-specific terpene line, designed for precision and versatility. Made from 100% natural, botanically derived terpenes, Classic delivers the entourage effect without an overpowering aroma. Whether you’re after pure strain profiles or a subtle fruity twist, this line offers a seamless way to infuse terpenes into your products with accuracy and ease.
classic.label: Classic

ShopHero.title: The Full Spectrum, at Your Fingertips
ShopHero.description: Shop our full range of strain-specific terpenes and flavor-packed profiles that maximize your products and help your business grow.

ShopQualityPromise.title: The Quality Your Business Deserves
ShopQualityPromise.description: Choosing the right terpene profile just got easier.

TerpeneShop.NoProductsInCategoryDescription: Try selecting different categories or clear filters to see more products.
TerpeneShop.NoProductsAvailableDescription: We're currently updating our inventory. Please check back soon for new products.

FeaturesAndBenefits.title: Features & Benefits

features.pureTerpenes: Made with pure refined double distilled terpenes
features.enhancesEffect: Enhances flavor, aroma, and entourage effect

FeaturesAndBenefits.benefitsDescription: Each terpene strain profile has its own unique blend of Terpenes and with so many variations, the experience of the "entourage effect" varies greatly from profile to profile.*
FeaturesAndBenefits.fdaDisclaimer: *These statements have not been substantiated by the FDA. It is not intended to diagnose, cure, prevent or relieve any disease.

instructions.dilution: Dilute before use with all oil-based concentrates (1-10%).
instructions.drinks: For drinks and beverages, we recommend <1% of the total volume. Try our Water Soluble Formulations for better solubility.
instructions.gummies: For gummies, we recommend <1% of the total volume. Try our Water Soluble Formulations for better solubility.

Details.title: Details
Details.transparencyNote: We sell our products in grams for full transparency. Selling by milliliters can be misleading, as terpene products are typically measured in grams for maximum accuracy and reproducibility.
Details.naturalDescription: This terpene profile is strain-specific, full spectrum, and botanically derived. We use only the finest domestically sourced terpene isolates to ensure consistent quality and taste, double distilled to maximize potency and flavor. Fabricated in our state-of-the-art cGMP certified facility by our team of master chemists, we provide only the best profiles available on the market today.
Details.technologyDescription: Produced in our advanced cGMP facility, all terpene isolates are double distilled for maximum aroma and potency. Every product is screened at our satellite testing location in Irvine, CA for pesticides, heavy metals, and residual solvents using in-house Mass Spectrometers, as well as third-party tested. Our terpene profiles are finely tuned through intensive research and development to achieve the best tasting aroma profiles. We take pride in our technology and leave no stone unturned to deliver the highest quality and best tasting terpene profiles.
Details.userExperienceDescription: Terpene profiles deliver a unique aromatic experience, often crafted with over 100 terpene isolates. This results in what is commonly known as the "entourage effect," providing a variety of distinct feelings and sensations.

CertificateOfAnalysis.title: Certificate of Analysis
CertificateOfAnalysis.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation

ProductReviews.EmailNotPublished: Your email address will not be published.

TrySamplePack.Note: Note: Want to add, swap, or remove something? Just write your choices in here and we’ll customize your pack for you.

TerpeneChartHero.heading: The Loud Spectrum Terpene Chart
TerpeneChartHero.description: Discover how these natural compounds power bold aromas, distinct effects, and therapeutic properties in plants, including cannabis. Whether you’re after citrus notes for energy or piney profiles for relaxation, this visual tool makes it easy to match profiles to your preferences. It’s a simple way to explore what terpenes can do for you and your customers.

TheLab.heading: The Science Behind Bold Flavor
TheLab.subheading:
Great taste is an art… 
and a science.
TheLab.description1: We pioneered the first full-spectrum, strain-specific terpene profile. While we can’t spill all the secrets behind our sauce, we can share what makes it special.
TheLab.description2: Behind every Loud Spectrum profile is our Flavor Science method, a proprietary process that takes the guesswork out of crafting exceptional flavor.  Through deep research and development, we’ve gained an understanding of every ingredient: its aroma, how it blends, and the precise formulation needed to bring it to life—to the point that we’ve perfected 200 profiles and counting.

premiumSourcing.title: Premium Sourcing: Only the Best
premiumSourcing.intro: We begin with the purest ingredients, carefully selecting:
premiumSourcing.item3: The finest cultivated hemp for flower-extracted terpenes
premiumSourcing.details: Every raw material meets strict safety and purity standards, ensuring clean, consistent, and authentic terpene profiles.

advancedExtraction.title: Advanced Extraction: Oregon Facility
advancedExtraction.description: Our Oregon-based extraction facility is equipped with cutting-edge technology to capture the true essence of terpenes. Using state-of-the-art extraction methods, we preserve the full complexity and potency of every strain.
advancedExtraction.item3: The finest cultivated hemp for flower-extracted terpenes

expertFormulation.title: Expert Formulation & Testing: Santa Ana Lab
expertFormulation.description: Once extracted, our terpenes move to our GMP-certified lab in Santa Ana, CA, where we meticulously formulate and refine each profile.
expertFormulation.item1: Custom terpene blends crafted by experts
expertFormulation.item2: Collaboration with industry leaders to fine-tune flavors
expertFormulation.item3: Rigorous testing to ensure unmatched depth & experience
expertFormulation.footer: Our team works closely with partners in the industry to perfect every flavor, ensuring authenticity, richness, and precision in every drop.

finalTesting.title: Final Testing & Innovation: Irvine R&D Lab
finalTesting.description1: Before any product reaches our clients, it undergoes comprehensive screening and refinement at our Irvine Research & Development Lab.
finalTesting.description2: By combining science, craftsmanship, and rigorous testing, we guarantee that every terpene profile delivers a flawless experience.
finalTesting.item1: Custom terpene blends crafted by experts
finalTesting.item2: Collaboration with industry leaders to fine-tune flavors
finalTesting.item3: Rigorous testing to ensure unmatched depth & experience

fromSeed.title: From Seed to Bottle—We Control Every Step
fromSeed.description: Our four-facility process ensures that every product meets the highest standards of purity, consistency, and innovation. Experience the Loud Spectrum difference.

ingredientsSection.label: Ingredients
ingredientsSection.title: Loud Spectrum blends are powered by naturally derived terpenes and a library of over 1,000 flavoring elements.

qualitySection.label: Our quality promise
qualitySection.title: The Highest Standards of Quality
qualitySection.description: Quality isn’t just our standard, it’s our signature move. Each profile undergoes expert-driven R&D, is crafted in ISO and cGMP-compliant facilities and is third-party tested for pesticides, heavy metals, and solvents. It’s a rigorous process, but you can literally taste the difference.

contactHero.title: Let’s Connect
contactHero.description: Have questions about mixing, dilution, product applications, or safety? We’re always keeping an eye on incoming questions, so you’ll hear back from us shortly.

contactForm.title: Start the Conversation
contactForm.description: Looking for custom formulations, wholesale pricing, or white-label solutions? Let's create something extraordinary together.
contactForm.success: Your message has been sent. We'll get back to you soon!
contactForm.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

wholesaleRegistrationHero.title: Wholesale Terpenes
wholesaleRegistrationHero.para1: At Loud Spectrum, we bring premium terpenes to businesses that demand the best.
wholesaleRegistrationHero.para2: Take advantage of competitive bulk pricing, exclusive custom profiles, and access to infinite products and samples—everything you need to deliver flavor and quality your customers will love.

wholesaleRegistrationForm.formTitle: Bulk Up With the Best Terpenes

waitingForApproval.title: Registration Under Review
waitingForApproval.description: Thank you for your interest in becoming a Loud Spectrum wholesale partner. Your application is currently being reviewed by our team.
waitingForApproval.nextStepsDescription: Our team will review your application and get back to you within 24-48 hours. You'll receive an email notification once your account is approved.

WholesaleRegistrationWorks.Point_01_Description: Fill out the wholesale registration form with your details.
WholesaleRegistrationWorks.Point_02_Description: Our team will review your application within 1-2 business days.
WholesaleRegistrationWorks.Point_03_Description: Once approved, log in with the email and password you used to register.
WholesaleRegistrationWorks.Point_04_Description: Browse bulk products, customize flavors, and explore our offerings.
WholesaleRegistrationWorks.Point_05_Description: Purchase wholesale products and any other items from our store with ease.

WhyChooseLoudSpectrum.WhyChooseSubtitle: Because ordinary terpenes just don’t cut it.

newPageHeroBanner.title: You've got high standards. We offer endless possibilities.
newPageHeroBanner.description: We’re always innovating terpene profiles in our lab. With new flavors rolling out regularly, check back often for the latest products that set your business apart.

commingSoon.title: A New Kind of Flavor Experience
commingSoon.description: What’s next for Loud Spectrum? We’ve been in the lab working on a bold new wave of terpene innovation, designed to elevate every moment in unexpected ways. Our latest venture is a line of first-to-market products that bring flavor to everyday experiences. Get a taste for the future of terpenes—and stay tuned for more.

InTheLab.Traditional_terpene_delivery_has_its_lim: Traditional terpene delivery has its limits, which is why Loud Spectrum pushed the boundaries and developed a signature Flavor Science process to elevate terpenes beyond the ordinary.
InTheLab.In_2015_we_introduced_the_first_Strain_S: In 2015, we introduced the first Strain-Specific Terpene Profiles, setting the standard and continuing to lead the industry.
InTheLab.From_our_first_customer_to_today_our_com: From our first customer to today, our commitment to research, innovation, and quality continues to push the industry forward.
InTheLab.Tailored_terpene_solutions_designed_for_: Tailored terpene solutions designed for our customers, earning us long-standing industry partnerships.
InTheLab.A_diverse_library_of_natural_high_qualit: A diverse library of natural, high-quality flavors formulated for depth, complexity, and effect.
InTheLab.Every_batch_is_third_party_tested_cGMP_c: Every batch is third-party tested, cGMP certified, and manufactured to exceed industry standards for purity and performance.

ShopByMood.The_Right_Flavor_for_Every_Feeling: The Right Flavor for Every Feeling

Alive.line1: For the uncompromising connoisseur, Alive comes out swinging with its pure, aromatic, and potent properties.
Alive.line2: This formula is a level above Live Resin and extracted directly from the finest flower through a specialized process in our cGMP Certified Facility.

Sweet.line1: Sweet delivers a delightful balance of smooth flavor and vibrant aroma.
Sweet.line2: A great choice for those seeking a mellow yet uplifting experience.

Classic.line1: Classic captures the essence of tradition with timeless flavor and consistent potency.
Classic.line2: Crafted for everyday use, it delivers a smooth and familiar experience with each inhale.

Dank.line1: Dank is rich, intense, and unapologetically bold in both aroma and effect.
Dank.line2: Tailored for seasoned users, this blend promises a deeply satisfying and powerful experience.

Enhance_your_products_with_the_widest_ra: Enhance your products with the widest range of premium terpenes, scientifically crafted to elevate every experience.

ShippingPolicy.title: Shipping Policy
ShippingPolicy.globalShipping: Global Shipping Available: We proudly ship to customers around the world using trusted carriers: USPS, UPS, and FedEx.
ShippingPolicy.under100: Orders under $100: A standard shipping rate will apply at checkout.
ShippingPolicy.over100: Orders over $100: Enjoy free shipping on us.
ShippingPolicy.expedited: Expedited Shipping: Need it faster? Reach out to us before placing your order, and we’ll provide upgraded shipping options for an additional fee.
ShippingPolicy.processingTime: Processing Time: Orders are typically processed within 1–3 business days. You will receive tracking information once your order ships.

RefundsReturns.title: Refunds & Returns
RefundsReturns.allSalesFinal: All Sales are Final: Due to the sensitive nature of our products, all sales are final. We follow strict quality and safety standards for returns.
RefundsReturns.unopened: Packages and products must be unopened, unused, and in their original intact condition.
RefundsReturns.returnShippingCost: All return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer.
RefundsReturns.noOpenedReturns: We do not accept returns or exchanges on opened items.
RefundsReturns.returnProcess: Return Process: If you'd like to request a return or exchange, please contact our support team order@loudspectrum.com within 7 days of receiving your order. Approved returns must be shipped back within 14 days.

ImportantNotes.title: Important Notes
ImportantNotes.domesticOrders: Domestic Orders are typically delivered between 1-7 days. We are not responsible for the carrier's delay.
ImportantNotes.damagedReport: Damaged or incorrect items must be reported within 3 days of delivery.
ImportantNotes.questions: For any questions or support, feel free to email us at order@loudspectrum.com or use our contact form.

Thank_you_for_choosing_Loud_Spectrum: Thank you for choosing Loud Spectrum (formerly Medical Terpenes). We’re committed to delivering our premium terpene products efficiently and transparently to customers worldwide.
For_any_questions_or_support: For any questions or support, feel free to email us at

QualitySafety.intro: At Loud Spectrum, quality is our craft and safety is our promise. We are committed to delivering terpene products that meet the highest standards of purity, consistency, and compliance.
QualitySafety.moreInfo: For more information on quality assurance or to request MSDS documents, contact us at

ProductPurityIntegrity.title: Product Purity & Integrity
ProductPurityIntegrity.pureTerpenes: 100% Pure Terpenes: Our products contain no fillers, no additives, no cutting agents, and are derived from high-grade botanical sources/flowers.
ProductPurityIntegrity.foodGrade: Food-Grade & GRAS-Listed: All Loud Spectrum terpenes are manufactured using ingredients that are Generally Recognized as Safe (GRAS) by the FDA for food and beverage use.
ProductPurityIntegrity.nonGMO: Non-GMO: We do not use genetically modified organisms, and our products are free of common allergens including gluten, soy, and dairy.

QualityControlTesting.title: Quality Control & Testing
QualityControlTesting.rigorousTesting: Every batch of our terpenes undergoes rigorous in-house and third-party testing to ensure:
QualityControlTesting.identityConsistency: Identity & Consistency: Verified through gas chromatography (GC) and other validated methods.
QualityControlTesting.purityScreening: Purity & Contaminant Screening: We screen for:
QualityControlTesting.batchTracking: Batch Tracking: Each bottle is traceable back to its batch for complete transparency and accountability.

SafetyAssurance.title: Safety Assurance
SafetyAssurance.msdsGuidelines: We follow strict handling and labeling guidelines in accordance with the Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS):
SafetyAssurance.highlyConcentrated: Highly Concentrated: Our terpenes are potent and should be diluted prior to use.
SafetyAssurance.professionalUse: For Professional Use Only: Not intended for direct consumption or undiluted application.
SafetyAssurance.storage: Storage: Store in a cool, dry place, away from sunlight and ignition sources. Keep out of reach of children and pets.
SafetyAssurance.msdsCompliance: MSDS Compliance: All of our products are accompanied by up-to-date MSDS documentation for regulatory and handling clarity.

CautionNotice.title: Caution Notice
CautionNotice.caution: Terpenes are highly aromatic and bioactive. Improper use may cause irritation or sensitization. Always wear appropriate protective gear (gloves, goggles) when handling undiluted products.

LegalPage.intro: Loud Spectrum (formerly Medical Terpenes) is committed to transparency and legal compliance in the development, marketing, and distribution of our terpene-based products.
LegalPage.moreInfo: For questions or legal inquiries, please contact us at

RegulatoryCompliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
RegulatoryCompliance.noControlledSubstances: No Controlled Substances: Loud Spectrum products do not contain any cannabinoids, including but not limited to CBD (Cannabidiol), THC (Tetrahydrocannabinol), or any other regulated compounds under federal or state law.
RegulatoryCompliance.terpenesOnly: Terpenes Only: Our offerings are composed solely of pure, botanical terpenes and terpene blends. All ingredients are GRAS-listed (Generally Recognized as Safe) and compliant with U.S. food and cosmetic standards.
RegulatoryCompliance.notForDirectUse: Not for Direct Inhalation or Consumption: Our terpenes are intended for professional use only, including formulation in cosmetics, food/beverage flavoring, and fragrance applications.

JurisdictionResponsibility.title: Jurisdiction & Responsibility
JurisdictionResponsibility.buyerResponsibility: Buyer Responsibility: It is the sole responsibility of the customer to ensure that use, possession, and application of our products complies with local, state, and federal laws. Loud Spectrum assumes no liability for misuse or unlawful distribution.
JurisdictionResponsibility.internationalOrders: International Orders: We ship worldwide in compliance with export regulations. However, we are not responsible for customs delays or confiscations. Customers should verify legality of terpene imports in their country before ordering.

NoMedicalClaims.title: No Medical Claims
NoMedicalClaims.content: Loud Spectrum makes no medical claims about the benefits or uses of terpenes. Our products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. All information provided is for educational purposes only.

IntellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
IntellectualProperty.content: All content on this site, including branding, product names, images, and formulations, is the intellectual property of Loud Spectrum and may not be copied or redistributed without written permission.

SECTION_1.title: SECTION 1 – WHAT DO WE DO WITH YOUR INFORMATION?
content: When you purchase something from our store, as part of the buying and selling process, we collect the personal information you give us such as your name, address and email address.
Email marketing (if applicable): With your permission, we may send you emails about our store, new products and other updates.

SECTION_2.title: SECTION 2 – CONSENT
content: How do you get my consent?

When you provide us with personal information to complete a transaction, verify your credit card, place an order, arrange for a delivery or return a purchase, we imply that you consent to our collecting it and using it for that specific reason only.
If we ask for your personal information for a secondary reason, like marketing, we will either ask you directly for your expressed consent, or provide you with an opportunity to say no.
How do I withdraw my consent?

If after you opt-in, you change your mind, you may withdraw your consent for us to contact you, for the continued collection, use or disclosure of your information, at anytime, by contacting us at info@medicalterpenes.com.

SECTION_3.title: SECTION 3 – DISCLOSURE
content: We may disclose your personal information if we are required by law to do so or if you violate our Terms of Service.
Payment:

If you choose a direct payment gateway to complete your purchase, then Stripe Gateway Payment stores your credit card data. It is encrypted through the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS). Your purchase transaction data is stored only as long as is necessary to complete your purchase transaction. After that is complete, your purchase transaction information is deleted.

All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover.
PCI-DSS requirements help ensure the secure handling of credit card information by our store and its service providers.

SECTION_5.title: SECTION 5 – THIRD-PARTY SERVICES
content: In general, the third-party providers used by us will only collect, use and disclose your information to the extent necessary to allow them to perform the services they provide to us.

However, certain third-party service providers, such as payment gateways and other payment transaction processors, have their own privacy policies in respect to the information we are required to provide to them for your purchase-related transactions.
For these providers, we recommend that you read their privacy policies so you can understand the manner in which your personal information will be handled by these providers.

In particular, remember that certain providers may be located in or have facilities that are located in a different jurisdiction than either you or us. So if you elect to proceed with a transaction that involves the services of a third-party service provider, then your information may become subject to the laws of the jurisdiction(s) in which that service provider or its facilities are located.

As an example, if you are located in Canada and your transaction is processed by a payment gateway located in the United States, then your personal information used in completing that transaction may be subject to disclosure under United States legislation, including the Patriot Act.
Once you leave our store’s website or are redirected to a third-party website or application, you are no longer governed by this Privacy Policy or our website’s Terms of Service.
Links
When you click on links on our store, they may direct you away from our site. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites and encourage you to read their privacy statements.

SECTION_6.title: SECTION 6 – SECURITY
content: To protect your personal information, we take reasonable precautions and follow industry best practices to make sure it is not inappropriately lost, misused, accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed.

If you provide us with your credit card information, the information is encrypted using secure socket layer technology (SSL) and stored with a AES-256 encryption. Although no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, we follow all PCI-DSS requirements and implement additional generally accepted industry standards.

By using this site, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site.

SECTION_8.title: SECTION 8 – CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY
content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please review it frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting on the website. If we make material changes to this policy, we will notify you here that it has been updated, so that you are aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we use and/or disclose it.
If our store is acquired or merged with another company, your information may be transferred to the new owners so that we may continue to sell products to you.

QUESTIONS.title: QUESTIONS AND CONTACT INFORMATION
content: If you would like to: access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you, register a complaint, or simply want more information contact our Privacy Compliance Officer at info@sauceterps.com
[Re: Privacy Compliance Officer]
[Los Angeles, CA, United States]

OVERVIEW.title: OVERVIEW
content: This website is operated by Sauce Terps. Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to Sauce Terps. Sauce Terps, offers this website, including all information, tools, and services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.

By visiting our site and/ or purchasing something from us, you engage in our “Service” and agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of Service”, “Terms”), including those additional terms and conditions and policies referenced herein and/or available by hyperlink. These Terms of Service apply to all users of the site, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and/ or contributors of content.

Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using our website. By accessing or using any part of the site, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the website or use any services. If these Terms of Service are considered an offer, acceptance is expressly limited to these Terms of Service.

Any new features or tools which are added to the current store shall also be subject to the Terms of Service. You can review the most current version of the Terms of Service at any time on this page. We reserve the right to update, change or replace any part of these Terms of Service by posting updates and/or changes to our website. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.

SECTION_1.title: SECTION 1 – DEFINITIONS
content: The terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to Sauce Terps. “You” refers to the buyer or viewer of our services.
The term “Service” refers to the website operated by Sauce Terps.

The term “Terms of Service” refers to the terms and conditions as outlined in this document, including those additional terms and conditions and policies referenced herein and/or available by hyperlink.

SECTION_2.title: SECTION 2 – AGREEMENT TO TERMS
content: By accessing or using the website, you are agreeing to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you disagree with any part of these Terms of Service or our Privacy Policy, you do not have permission to access the website or use the services. If these Terms of Service are considered an offer, acceptance is expressly limited to these Terms of Service.
Any new features or tools which are added to the current store shall also be subject to the Terms of Service.

SECTION_3.title: SECTION 3 – SECTION 3 – ORDER ACCEPTANCE
content: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before placing an order. You are providing your information so that we can perform the services you request. This constitutes a contractual agreement between you and Sauce Terps for the purchase of the products described in the Order Confirmation.

The descriptions of products on our website are as accurate as possible. However, we do not warrant that product descriptions or other content of this website is error-free, complete, or current. If a product offered by us itself is not as described, your sole remedy is to return it in unused condition.

SECTION_4.title: SECTION 4 – SECTION 4 – PRICING AND AVAILABILITY
content: Prices for our products are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right at any time to modify or discontinue the Service (or any part or content thereof) without notice at any time. We shall not be liable to you or to any third-party for any modification, price change, suspension or discontinuance of the Service.

We reserve the right to limit the quantities of any products or services that we offer. All descriptions of products or product pricing are subject to change at any time without notice, at the sole discretion of Sauce Terps. We reserve the right to discontinue any product at any time. Any offer for any product or service made on this site is void where prohibited.

SECTION_5.title: SECTION 5 – SECTION 5 – PRODUCTS OR SERVICES (if applicable)
content: Certain products or services may be available exclusively online through the website. These products or services may have limited quantities and are subject to return or exchange only according to our Return Policy.

We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images of our products that appear on the website. We cannot guarantee that your computer monitor's display of any color will be accurate.

SECTION_6.title: SECTION 6 – SECTION 6 – OWNERSHIP
content: All products and services are the property of Sauce Terps and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell or exploit any portion of the Service, use of the Service, or access to the Service or any contact on the website through which the service is provided, without express written permission by Sauce Terps.
The headings used in this agreement are included for convenience only and will not limit or otherwise affect any term.

SECTION_7.title: SECTION 7 – SECTION 7 – MODIFICATIONS TO THE SERVICE AND PRICES
content: Prices for our products are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right at any time to modify or discontinue the Service (or any part or content thereof) without notice at any time. We shall not be liable to you or to any third-party for any modification, price change, suspension or discontinuance of the Service.

We reserve the right to limit the quantities of any products or services that we offer. All descriptions of products or product pricing are subject to change at any time without notice, at the sole discretion of Sauce Terps. We reserve the right to discontinue any product at any time. Any offer for any product or service made on this site is void where prohibited.

SECTION_8.title: SECTION 8 – SECTION 8 – ORDER CANCELLATION
content: Orders can be cancelled if they have not been processed or shipped. If your order has been processed or shipped, you must follow our return policy.

SECTION_9.title: SECTION 9 – SECTION 9 – RETURNS (if applicable)
content: Our Return Policy only applies to products that are defective or damaged. If you have received a damaged or defective product, please contact us at info@sauceterps.com within 7 days of receiving your order. If your return is approved, we will initiate a refund to your credit card (or original method of payment). You will receive the credit within a certain amount of days, depending on your card issuer's policies.

SECTION_10.title: SECTION 10 – SECTION 10 – SECTION 10 – PROMOTIONS
content: We may use your information to provide you with promotional information about third parties and other third-party offers that we believe you may find interesting if you tell us that you wish to receive such information.
You can opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from us by following the unsubscribe link or instructions provided in any email we send or by contacting us.

SECTION_11.title: SECTION 11 – SECTION 11 – SECTION 11 – PROTECTION OF YOUR INFORMATION
content: We adopt appropriate data collection, storage and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction information and data stored on our Site.
Sensitive and private data exchange between the Site and its Users happens over a SSL secured communication channel and is encrypted and protected with digital signatures.

SECTION_12.title: SECTION 12 – SECTION 12 – SECTION 12 – ELECTRONIC COMMUNICATIONS
content: You agree to receive electronic communications from us. You agree that all agreements, notices, disclosures and other communications that we provide to you electronically, via email and on the Site, satisfy any legal requirement that such communications be in writing.

You hereby acknowledge that electronic mail is not a secure method of communication and that electronic communications can be intercepted, lost, deleted, altered, corrupted, delayed, incomplete or contain viruses. Sauce Terps shall not be liable for any errors or omissions in the electronic communications sent by you or received by Sauce Terps.

SECTION_13.title: SECTION 13 – SECTION 13 – SECTION 13 – INTERNATIONAL USERS
content: By using the website, you agree to comply with all applicable laws regarding online conduct and acceptable content. You are responsible for ensuring that your use of the website complies with the laws of your jurisdiction, including but not limited to copyright laws. You agree that you will not use the website for any illegal purpose or in violation of any local, national or international law.

You agree that you will not use the website in a way that may damage, disable, overburden, or impair the website or interfere with any other party's use of the website, including their ability to engage in real-time activities through the website.

SECTION_14.title: SECTION 14 – SECTION 14 – SECTION 14 – INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
content: The website and its original content, features and functionality are owned by Sauce Terps and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws.
Sauce Terps's trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of Sauce Terps.

SECTION_15.title: SECTION 15 – SECTION 15 – SECTION 15 – SECTION 15 – ACCOUNT TERMINATION
content: We may, in our sole discretion, at any time and for any or no reason, discontinue the Service, or any part thereof. This may include, but is not limited to, any products available on the website or any content of the website, with or without prior notice to you. You agree that Sauce Terps shall not be liable to you or any third-party for any modification, suspension or discontinuance of the Service.
You agree that Sauce Terps shall not be liable to you or any third-party for any modification, suspension or discontinuance of the Service.

SECTION_16.title: SECTION 16 – SECTION 16 – SECTION 16 – SECTION 16 – MODIFICATIONS TO THESE TERMS OF SERVICE
content: Sauce Terps reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms of Service at any time. If a revision is material we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.

By continuing to access or use our website after any revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, you are no longer authorized to use the website.

SECTION_17.title: SECTION 17 – SECTION 17 – SECTION 17 – SECTION 17 – QUESTIONS AND CONTACT INFORMATION
content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.

metadata.title: Beyond Ordinary Blog | Loud Spectrum
metadata.description: Explore our collection of articles about terpenes, flavor science, and the extraordinary world of botanical extracts. Stay informed with Loud Spectrum's insights and expertise.
metadata.keywords: blog, terpenes, flavor science, botanical extracts, loud spectrum, articles, insights
metadata.fallbackDescription: Explore our collection of articles about terpenes and flavor science.
